plugins.prepareCmd: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const cargo = fs.readFileSync('Cargo.toml', 'utf8').replace(/^version = \".*\"/m, 'version = \"${nextRelease.version}\"'); fs.writeFileSync('Cargo.toml', cargo); const ext = fs.readFileSync('extension.toml', 'utf8').replace(/^version = \".*\"/m, 'version = \"${nextRelease.version}\"'); fs.writeFileSync('extension.toml', ext);"
